channel.title: UVA CS DMP
channel.description: Recent content on UVA CS DMP

item.title: DMP Requirements
item.description: Congratuations to our 2022 Distinguished Majors Graduates! Amanuel Anteneh, Skylar Brodowski, Chengyuan Cai, Chase Dawson, Minjun (Elena) Long, Reza Mirzaiee, Mohit Srivastav, Omika Suryawanshi, Peiyu Zhang, Karen Zipor Distinguished Major in Computer Science Bachelor of Arts Computer Science majors who have completed 18 credit hours towards their major may apply to the Distinguished Majors Program. The DMP focuses on a creative student research project as advised and approved by an advisor.

Distinguished Majors in Computer Science 2022 Amanuel Anteneh, Highest Distinction An Analysis of Gaussian Boson Sampling for Graph Isomorphism & Graph Classification using Supervised Machine Learning Advisor: Olivier Pfister (Second reader: Israel Klich) Skylar Brodowski, High Distinction A Random Forest Model for ATP Site Prediction on Kinases Advisor: Ku-Lung Hsu (Second reader: Philip Bourne) Chengyuan Cai, Distinction Expanding the Language Scope of TextAttack: Chinese Adversarial Attacks Advisor: Yanjun Qi (Second reader: Yangfeng Ji)
